response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value and the potential it holds, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a strategic investment opportunity that aligns well with your current needs and budget. Should you decide to proceed, this could be a game-changer for your company. We look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 14000}
